TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TranslationMiddleware extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Bot.Builder.IMiddleware

Docs.summary: Middleware for translating text between the user and bot. Uses the Microsoft Translator Text API.

MemberSignature.Value: public TranslationMiddleware (string[] nativeLanguages, string translatorKey, bool toUserLanguage = false);

Public Sub New (nativeLanguages As String(), translatorKey As String, Optional toUserLanguage As Boolean = false)

Docs.param: The languages supported by your app.
Your subscription key for the Microsoft Translator Text API.
Indicates whether to transalte messages sent from the bot into the user's language.

MemberSignature.Value: public TranslationMiddleware (string[] nativeLanguages, string translatorKey, System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string,System.Collections.Generic.List<string>> patterns, bool toUserLanguage = false);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string[] nativeLanguages, string translatorKey, class System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2<string, class System.Collections.Generic.List`1<string>> patterns, bool toUserLanguage) cil managed
Public Sub New (nativeLanguages As String(), translatorKey As String, patterns As Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)), Optional toUserLanguage As Boolean = false)

Docs.param: The languages supported by your app.
Your subscription key for the Microsoft Translator Text API.
List of regex patterns, indexed by language identifier, that can be used to flag text that should not be translated.
Indicates whether to transalte messages sent from the bot into the user's language.
Docs.remarks: Each pattern the describes an entity that should not be translated. For example, in French je m’appelle ([a-z]+), which will avoid translation of anything coming after je m’appelle.

new Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Ai.Translation.TranslationMiddleware : string[] * string * System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.List<string>> * Func<Microsoft.Bot.Builder.ITurnContext, string> * Func<Microsoft.Bot.Builder.ITurnContext, System.Threading.Tasks.Task<bool>> * bool -> Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Ai.Translation.TranslationMiddleware

Docs.param: List of languages supported by your app
Your subscription key for the Microsoft Translator Text API.
List of regex patterns, indexed by language identifier, that can be used to flag text that should not be translated.
A delegate for getting the user language, to use in place of the Detect method of the Microsoft Translator Text API.
A delegate for checking whether the user requested to change their language.
Indicates whether to transalte messages sent from the bot into the user's language.
Docs.remarks: Each pattern the describes an entity that should not be translated. For example, in French je m’appelle ([a-z]+), which will avoid translation of anything coming after je m’appelle.
